response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation that I believe could enrich your life in ways unforeseen. Given its significance, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $2,000,000. Your acceptance would be a recognition of its true worth and a step towards creating a lasting connection between us. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this exceptional piece with you.", "product_price": 2000000}
